owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of bank and AP reconciliation exceptions

residual_risks.description: Entity-level TB balances not zeroed, indicating potential reporting inaccuracies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement stricter review processes and automated checks for TB balancing

residual_risks.description: High flux analysis exceptions indicate potential operational inefficiencies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Conduct detailed variance analysis and enhance flux monitoring tools
